title: fibersketch
author: fibersketch
content: Anyone know if it's still possible to convert these to mainnet still?Â  Found out I had some ETH tokens stored in a MEW wallet and completely forgot about them.Binance isn't an option for me unfortunately and I suspect that likely the only option but thought I'd ask the community anyway.- FS

comments.author: fibersketch
comments.body: for anyone else in this situation in the near future, I found that as of today, Huobi still does the conversion when depositing to a regular ETH address.
